attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My husband and myself had a baby boy, full term at 39 weeks gestation last December 2006.Our baby, Cameron, had to go on a ventilator the mimute he was born by C-section as he couldnt breathe on his own.After 10 weeks of tests, operations, biopsies, MRI, and so on, the doctors asked my husband and myself to make a date to switch off the ventilators as there was nothing further that could be done to save Camerons life.After letting our baby go, after 8 months of genetic research done on a laboratory in Oxford ,it was discovered that Camerons suffered from 2 defective genes, which is the reason why he couldnt have made it.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
